descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Offroad MotorBike is an arcade-focused VR riding experience built around freedom, terrain challenge, and pure riding fun.

Hop on your motorbike and ride across dirt roads, rocky paths, steep hills, and open offroad environments. Every surface feels different, pushing you to control your balance, speed, and direction as you explore the landscape.

The gameplay is designed to be fast, accessible, and enjoyable for all players. No complex simulation systems — just intuitive controls, satisfying movement, and the thrill of offroad riding.

Each area offers new terrain challenges, encouraging you to ride freely, take risks, and master rough paths. Whether you prefer smooth cruising or aggressive riding, the experience adapts to your style.

With immersive VR visuals, responsive bike handling, and arcade-style pacing, Offroad MotorBike delivers a thrilling offroad adventure that’s easy to jump into and hard to put down.

Ride anywhere. Control the terrain. Feel the freedom.
